commit.message:
tree-ssa-dce.c (nr_walks): New variable.

2009-11-26  Richard Guenther  <rguenther@suse.de>

	* tree-ssa-dce.c (nr_walks): New variable.
	(mark_aliased_reaching_defs_necessary): Adjust oracle cut-off.
	(perform_tree_ssa_dce): Init nr_walks.

From-SVN: r154676
